TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
> 
> EDIT: Got a new web browser, moving on.

Has that actually worked? It hasn\'t for anyone else with these issues as far as I can tell.
Did the site go down?
Nope. As stated, use tor if you\'re having issues with access.
Oh boy, we almost started a world war.
Not really, unless you count six nations beating up Imandreas as a \'world war\'.

> 
> Not really, unless you count six nations beating up Imandreas as a \'world war\'.

All nations except four, I think, were involved in the standoff.

> 
> Not really, unless you count six nations beating up Imandreas as a \'world war\'.

First of all, personal attacks are never tolerated on *both* forums.

Second, when I get my hands on the Reaper Corperation...

Third, Radion saved my a\*\* from striking at the Aeresian naval force. Seriously, I was about to start when he came on. **That** close.

Finally, the browser\'s coding is different, so it must have changed server connections and stuff.

And I think I just RP\'d.

\*Hiding from banhammer\*
Of course, Tor broke for me and I can\'t post on the site, only read it. \*Cue slamming head into desk\*

> 
> Of course, Tor broke for me...

What problems are you having with it?
Alright, the site officially hates me, and my laptop is FUBAR. Till I make a subsequent post about getting on, I need to fix my laptop.
Site appears to be down.
It does that for some people. It picks some IPs and goes \'no connection for you!\' for a few hours. Best way around it is to use a proxy service, eg Tor.

> 
> It does that for some people. It picks some IPs and goes \'no connection for you!\' for a few hours. Best way around it is to use a proxy service, eg Tor.

I use firefox, so are you talking about this:

The connection has timed out.

 The server at krp.net78.net is taking too long to respond.

 The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few

 moments.

 If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer\'s network

 connection.

 If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure

 that Firefox is permitted to access the Web.
It won\'t work for any browser you use that doesn\'t go through a proxy. I get the exact same thing.
How long would it be until I can use my regular browser again?
No idea. Try every so often. It usually clears up by the next day.
Exactly, and it\'s really annoying, as he said, use Tor or something similar.

> 
> Exactly, and it\'s really annoying, as he said, use Tor or something similar.

Tor\'s uber slow. I understand there\'s really nothing I can do, it\'s just an extremely annoying quirk.
Is the site genuinely down now? I can\'t get to it even through Tor.
Down for me aswell

> 
> Is the site genuinely down now? I can\'t get to it even through Tor.

The webhost is having problems once more, only this time they\'re not being specific as to what. All we can do is wait for one of two things - 

a) For the website to come back online (likely)

![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) For me to cancel my next vacation in a few weeks and use the money to get a website with a paid host (not so much)
Haha, just dont do the last one ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Give me a week. How much does a site cost? Probably get at least 50 to use next week.
Its back one everyone! For me at least....
I don\'t know about anyone else, but I\'d be willing to make donations towards the server. I don\'t know, maybe 5 dollars, maybe 20 dollars, maybe 100.
